en: And [mention] the Day when the heaven will split open with [emerging] clouds,
and the angels will be sent down in successive descent.
True sovereignty, that Day, is for the Most Merciful.
True sovereignty, that Day, is for the Most Merciful.
And it will be upon the disbelievers a difficult Day.
And the Day the wrongdoer will bite on his hands [in regret]

ar: يَقُولُ يَلَيْتَنِى اتَّخَذْتُ مَعَ الرَّسُولِ سَبِيلً
en: he will say, "Oh, I wish I had taken with the Messenger a way.

ar: يَقُولُ يَلَيْتَنِى اتَّخَذْتُ مَعَ الرَّسُولِ سَبِيلًا
en: he will say, "Oh, I wish I had taken with the Messenger a way.

ar: يَوَيْلَتَى لَيْتَنِى لَمْ أَتَّخِذْ فُلَانًا خَلِيلًا
en: Oh, woe to me! I wish I had not taken that one as a friend.

ar: يَوَيْلَتَى لَيْتَنِى لَمْ أَتَّخِذْ فُلَانًا خَلِيلًا
en: Oh, woe to me! I wish I had not taken that one as a friend.

ar: لَّقَدْ أَضَلَّنِى عَنِ الذِّكْرِ بَعْدَ إِذْ جَاءَنِى
en: He led me away from the remembrance after it had come to me.
And ever is Satan, to man, a deserter."
And the Messenger has said, "O my Lord,

ar: إِنَّ قَوْمِى اتَّخَذُوا هَذَا الْقُرْءَانَ مَهْجُورًا
en: indeed my people have taken this Qur’an as [a thing] abandoned."
